basics.name: Francesco Zorzi
basics.label: Software Engineer Manager
basics.summary: Software Engineer Manager with 6+ years of experience in full-stack development and team leadership. Proven track record in delivering scalable software solutions across financial services and emerging tech companies. Passionate about clean code, best practices, and fostering team growth through modern development methodologies.

work.name: Technesthai
work.summary: Lead a development team in building modern full-stack applications while managing cloud infrastructure and establishing engineering best practices in collaboration with the CTO.
highlights: Lead full-stack development using **Vue.js 3**, **Vuetify**, **.NET 8/9**, **Entity Framework Core**, and **PostgreSQL/SQL Server** databases
Collaborate with CTO in managing **AWS infrastructure** including **S3**, **CloudWatch**, and **Docker** containerization for scalable deployments
Manage team of 8 developers with **95%+ on-time delivery** using mixed **Agile/Waterfall** methodologies tailored to project requirements
Establish and enforce **coding standards**, **code review processes**, and **CI/CD best practices** across the organization
Lead technical recruitment including job descriptions, interviews, and onboarding of new team members

work.name: IasonLtd
work.summary: Progressed from Junior Consultant to Manager, leading teams in financial risk applications development and regulatory compliance projects for global banking clients.
highlights: **Manager:** Led 8-person IT team, successfully migrating legacy ATS to **Vue.js/Vuetify** with **.NET** backend, improving performance
**Senior Consultant:** Led teams in Counterparty Credit Risk (CCR) and Market Data projects, focusing on **SA-CCR** and **FRTB** regulatory compliance implementations
**Consultant:** Managed 4-person development team implementing CCR application updates using **Java** to meet evolving regulatory requirements
**Junior Consultant:** Enhanced financial risk applications, **reduced critical bugs** through systematic debugging and optimization using **Java**
Specialized in exposure calculation algorithms and regulatory reporting for global banking compliance

courses: Strong analytical and problem-solving foundation with mathematics and engineering principles
International experience in financial technology and quantitative methods

projects.name: PodCats - Full-Stack Podcast Manager
projects.description: Comprehensive podcast management platform demonstrating full-stack development skills. Built with **Vue.js 3** and **Vuetify 3** frontend consuming a **RESTful API backend in GoLang**. Features include **multi-user authentication**, **RSS feed processing**, **automated updates** via cron jobs, and **universal search capabilities**.

projects.name: HomeLab Infrastructure
projects.description: Self-managed infrastructure demonstrating **DevOps and system administration skills**. Started with Raspberry Pi and **Pi-Hole**, expanded to managing a **Proxmox virtualization cluster** with dedicated **opnSense firewall VM**. Hands-on experience with **containerization**, **networking**, **security**, and **infrastructure automation**.

achievements.title: Team Leadership
achievements.description: Successfully led and managed development teams ranging from 4 to 8 people across multiple projects and organizations

achievements.title: Technical Migration
achievements.description: Led successful migration of legacy applications to modern tech stack, improving performance by 40% and user satisfaction

achievements.title: Budget Management
achievements.description: Managed annual IT budgets exceeding €2M while maintaining project delivery timelines and quality standards

achievements.title: Regulatory Compliance
achievements.description: Specialized in financial regulatory implementations including SA-CCR and FRTB for global banking clients
